about_the_game:
Explore the Ceplion Island and discover the truth. Unique platformer mechanics, interesting characters, detailed enemy patterns and Supernatural Combat Abilities.

Whitney is a rebellious girl who lives in a small town in Kearnia. After losing her parents to war, she starts fighting for survival in the cold, dark streets. As the war escalates, she has to flee the town. So she escapes by boarding a freighter as a fugitive. When she finally arrives at Ceplion Island, she begins to wander around. But little did she know, she was about to uncover a miracle that would change the fate of the entire mankind.



Battle against The Believers and a variety of creatures!

The Believers are a group of soldiers who believes that King Osmond was sent by God to save Ceplion.



Jump, dash, climb and more! You need to have what it takes in order to survive.

Ceplion is filled with obstacles, spikes and energy orbs. Whitney has to get past them to find out the secrets that The Island and The King are keeping.



Characters with deep backstories to explore.

Explore the town, the forest and more to meet with people. They might know a thing or two about what has happened here. Some of them are there just to have some fun!

Features


  • A single-player, adventure, with a charming cast of characters and a deep touching story of self-discovery.
  • Brutal platforming challenges, secret areas and shortcuts! If you have sharp eyes, you can find find the secrets to make things easier!
  • Extra levels and side stories to explore! Come back to places after you unlock new skills and powers to create new paths of your own!
  • Combat mechanics with attack combos, precise-timed parrying, range attacks, dashing and smashing!
  • Dozens of detailed enemy patterns! Some of them parries your attacks, some jumps to you and some of them explodes!
  • Evolve with powerful new skills and abilities! Gain spells, strength and speed. Use the ancient power of the Protectors!
  • Beautifully painted landscapes, with extravagant parallax, give a unique sense of depth to a side-on world.

short_description: Embark on an epic journey in Ceplion, a metroidvania-inspired action-platformer. Explore the Ceplion Island, uncovering mysteries and ancient secrets. Engage in precise combat against believers and monstrous creatures. Harness the power of inheritors to bring an end to the relentless war.
